block.title: Configure Your Ziften Zenith Technical Add-on For Splunk
block.text: All of the following configuration steps are currently optional.

block.title: (Optional) VirusTotal Setup for Ziften Splunk
block.text: In this section, you can chose to configure a VirusTotal API key. By doing so, your Ziften Zentith Technical Add-on can correlate your data to VirusTotal. In order for your application to utilize VirusTotal services, you must enter valid VirusTotal API key. You can register for a free API key at www.virustotal.com
